channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Outside entrance to Mapes House, 1st January
item.description:
Has been on street since mid December. Reported on 23 Dec and got a response "H&S unsafe - no further action required". Action is required - please remove

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Winchester Avenue, Kilburn, London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Fly-tip Small - Less than one bag

item.title: Rubbish on street pavement, 1st January
item.description:
Rubbish and overflowing rubbish from bin bags - has been on the street pavement, at the entrance to Heverham Road, for over a week. Thank you.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Heverham Road, Plumstead

item.title: Glass Fragments on the Path, 1st January
item.description:
It looks like someone has smashed a car window or something as there are glass fragments along here. Please could this be cleared, as it is unsafe?

item.title: Bus Shelter Glass Smashed, 1st January
item.description:
Noticed on Wednesday 31st December 2025 that the bus shelter outside Lesnes Abbey had been smashed, with glass on the ground. Maybe this could be rectified asap for the New Year?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Abbey Road, West Heath, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Damage - smashed glass or panels / jagged metal edges on shelter

item.title: Dog mess on pavement needs clearance, 1st January
item.description:
Outside no.24 today but over the last month or two this has been happening repeatedly on Crebor Street between numbers 24-18. Please could the council remove this latest mess and take further action against repeated incidences on this street.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Crebor Street, East Dulwich, Greater London

item.title: Obstructing emergency access to and emergency evacuation from cambridge court, amhurst park, london n16 5aq, 1st January
item.description:
